title: Tokimeki Memorial
creator: Konami
description: Tokimeki Memorial is a dating sim game in which the player controls a male freshman from Kirameki High School.
subject: dating sim; romance

title: The Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney
creator: CAPCOM
description: The story follows Phoenix "Nick" Wright, a rookie defense attorney who attempts to have his clients declared "not guilty".
subject: mystery; detective

title: Doki Doki Literature Club
creator: Team Salvato
description: Although it initially appears to be a light-hearted dating simulator, it is actually a metafictional psychological horror game that extensively breaks the fourth wall.
subject: meta; psychological horror

title: Analogue: A Hate Story
creator: Love Conquers All Games
description: A science-fiction epistolary tale about an abandoned space colony ship that resurfaces after drifting in space for centuries
subject: sci-fi; mystery

title: Long Live the Queen
creator: Georgina Bensley
description: The story of the game follows a young princess who is training to become queen after the death of her mother. The objective of the game is to keep the princess alive for 40 weeks until she turns 15 and is crowned.
subject: raising simulator

title: 428: Shibuya Scramble
creator: Chunsoft
description: The stories of five different individuals who, over the course of 10 hours, help solve the mystery behind a kidnapping that took place in the city of Shinbuya, both intentionally and accidentally.
subject: live action; mystery

title: Cinderella Phenomenon
creator: Dicesuki
description: The cold-hearted crown princess gets cursed by a Cinderella curse. The story follows how she break the curse and learn to compassionate
subject: fairytale; romance

title: Dysfunctional Systems
creator: Dischan Media
description: The story follows Winter Harrison, a "mediator"-in-training, as she attempts to resolve chaotic situations in different worlds.
subject: adventure; utopian

title: Hatoful Boyfriend
creator: Mist Psi Press
description: The game is set in a version of Earth populated by sapient birds, and its main story follows the player character and protagonist—the only human attending St. PigeoNation's Institute, an elite school for birds—as she finds love among her avian acquaintances.
subject: romance; comedic

title: Nameless ~ The One Thing You Must Recall~
creator: Sujin Ri
description: Eri is an ordinary looking freshman who attends Crobi Academy. With her parents working as researchers overseas, she is left all alone at her grandparents' house after her grandfather's death. Left by herself, Eri continues to obsess over her ball jointed dolls; a hobby she's unable to tell anyone about, even her friends.
subject: romance

title: Disco Elysium
creator: ZA/UM
description: Disco Elysium takes place in the seaside district of a fictional city still recovering from a revolution which occurred decades prior to the game's start. Players take the role of an amnesiac detective who has been tasked with solving a murder mystery.
subject: mystery; adventure

title: The Walking Dead: The Telltale Definitive Series
creator: Skybound Games
subject: horro; adventure

title: Needy Streamer Overload
creator: WSS Playground
description: The game follows Ame-chan and the player, P-Chan, who is her partner and producer. The goal is to get one million subscribers before 30 days are up. Every day, through a cutesy windows 95-esque user interface, P-Chan can decide what activities Ame-chan does every day in order to grasp new ideas for streams, which will also raise or lower three stats in very different ways: stress, affection, and mental darkness.
subject: psychological horror

title: VA-11 Hall-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action
creator: Sukeban Games
description: In the game, the player assumes the role of a bartender at "VA-11 Hall-A" (pronounced Valhalla), a small dive bar[6] in a dystopian downtown said to attract the "most fascinating" of clientele.[7] Set in the year 207X,[8] according to the game's official website, VA-11 Hall-A is described as a "a booze em' up about waifus, technology, and post-dystopia life", in a world where "corporations reign supreme, all human life is infected with nanomachines designed to oppress them, and the terrifying White Knights ensure that everyone obeys the laws."[
subject: cyberpunk

title: Venba
creator: Visai Games
description: Play as Venba, a South Indian immigrant mother connecting with her son through the language of food.
subject: culture; mystery
